nhc_headline: ...DISTURBANCE LIKELY TO CAUSE HEAVY RAINS AND COASTAL FLOODING IN NORTHEASTERN MEXICO AND TEXAS BEGINNING ON TUESDAY...
summary:
...DISTURBANCE LIKELY TO CAUSE HEAVY RAINS AND COASTAL FLOODING IN NORTHEASTERN MEXICO AND TEXAS BEGINNING ON TUESDAY...
 As of 10:00 PM CDT Mon Jun 17
 the center of One was located near 20.8, -93.0
 with movement N at 7 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 999 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.
